amendment.description: To require a report on the consequences of failing to act on trade agreements.

action.text: Amendment SA 650 proposed by Senator Thune.

vote.text: Amendment SA 650, under the order of 9/21/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 52. Record Vote Number: 147.
